description:
Located in Santa Fe, New Mexico, our attorneys at the law firm of Reddick Moss have provided exceptional counsel and support to clients throughout the state and across the country since 2011. During this time, we have grown to include four total law offices across the United States, and we have become one of the most prominent and successful legal practices for individuals, families and others adversely affected by any of the following:

  • Nursing home abuse and neglect
  • Medical and hospital negligence
  • Catastrophic personal injuries and wrongful death
  • Tractor-trailer wrecks and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Defective products
  • Unsafe property conditions and premises liability

Regarded as among the leading trial lawyers in the country, our attorneys have more than 50 years of total combined legal experience. During our time in practice, we have recovered more than $500 million in total compensation for our plaintiff clients.

Our lawyers have gained reputations for our unmatched advocacy as well as our unwavering resolve at helping our clients obtain the justice they deserve as efficiently as possible. In honor for our outstanding professionalism and stellar client service, our lawyers have also earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers, including AV Preeminent peer-review ratings* through Martindale-Hubbell for our co-founders.

Perhaps most meaningful of all, our law firm has received countless testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients, and we find great satisfaction in being able to help so many during their most dire times of need. To find out more about how we can best assist you with obtaining justice in the wake of a preventable tragedy, you can contact Reddick Moss to take advantage of our free initial consultation.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary.

Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
